content: a yarn of serendipity pam knighton-haener kinnedy nichelle square regardless of skill level please read through entire pattern before beginning kinnedy nichelle is the fourth square in a series that i am designing as a legacy for my grandchildren kinnedy loves volleyball and her four younger brothers she is kind and nurturing with a beautiful soul hook/finished size 4 5 mm 11 5 mm 12 crochet terms us terminology throughout skill level intermediate to experienced yarn and colors used ▪ i love this cotton worsted weight 100% cotton  colorway 1 a - buttercup b - mint c - amethyst d - ivory e - deep teal  colorway 2 a - pewter b - tart orange c - burnt sienna d - olive e - taupe f - dove additional items needed stitch markers and darning needle stitches used double magic_ring long single_crochet long single_crochet standing stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet invisible join join double_crochet double_crochet st s stitch/stitches fpdc front post double_crochet space space treble_crochet treble_crochet chain chain 2tr-cluster 2 treble_crochet cluster yo yarn over picot round round back-stitch single_crochet single_crochet hps horizontal puff fpsc front post single_crochet shell bpsc back post single_crochet kinnedy nichelle square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 1 of 23 double magic_ring bpsc video at a yarn of serendipity insert hook from back-to-front-to-back around post so standing stitch post is in back of your hook yo and pull up a loop start with a slip_stitch on hook yo and pull through remaining 2 loops on hook insert hook into designated st or chain space and finish the st fpdc as normal yo insert hook from front-to-back-to-front around post video at a yarn of serendipity so post is in front of hook yo pull up a loop invisible join yo pull through 2 loops on hook 2 times do not join after completing last st of the round cut yarn treble_crochet and pull yarn tail through st yo 2 times insert hook into st yo pull up a loop remove hook and insert from back-to-front of the 2nd st yo pull through 2 loops 3 times of the round grab yarn and gently pull through 2tr-cluster from the back insert yo 2 times insert hook in st yo pull through st yo pull hook from bottom- through 2 loops on hook 2 times to-top of the center yo 2 times insert hook in same st yo pull through st yo of the last st of round pull through 2 loops on hook 2 times pull yarn gently yo and pull through all 3 loops on hook through st picot anchor the join by once you have completed the stitch chain 3 drawing through any insert hook into the back bar of the first chain slip_stitch through all back loop of first and loops on the hook last sts of round and weave in ends back-stitch fold the work toward you identify the back of the video at a yarn of serendipity designated stitch long
